Name: Superposition
About the game: Superposition is a simple sokoban style puzzle game about duplication. By splitting yourself into multiple copies you have to maneuver onto all goal tiles simultaneously to progress. The goal with this game was to iterate on a few novel mechanics in a sokoban world, and play with the consequences to discover interesting scenarios. The game contains 50 puzzles that intend to explore those mechanics.
